name: Silrolette
description:
A minimalistic, casual puzzle game, in which you rotate groups of tiles to reassemble a silhouette image, using the least amount of rotations possible. As an added challenge, you can go back and reattempt puzzles you already solved, to see if there's a more efficient solution.

Try the tutorial for a quick overview on how to play!
(This game was designed with mobile devices in mind; downloads for mobile builds will be posted soon)
